description: Mukunda Neupane is a Nepalese trade unionist and politician. As of recent records, he holds a high-ranking position in the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Socialist). He has also served as the president of the General Federation of Nepalese Trade Unions. Neupane was first elected to parliament in 1991, representing the Bara 1 constituency, and was re-elected in 1994. He returned to parliament in 2018 as a member for the CPN (UML) party list.
short_description: Nepali trade unionist and politician, who has served as a Member of Parliament.
